      • getTst

        public TernarySearchTries<java.lang.Integer> getTst()
        Get all connections within rectangle
        Parameters:
        x1 - the x coordinate of the first point.
        y1 - the y coordinate of the first point.
        x2 - the x coordinate of the second point.
        y2 - the y coordinate of the second point.
        Returns:
        Returns instance of the singleton class TernarySearchTries used for finding roads by street name

      • getRoads

        public java.lang.String[] getRoads(java.lang.String key)
        Get Roads method takes a String and sends it to address parser. The address parser chops it up into an array of strings. It then sends the first string (road name) to TST and ask it to find keys with the given prefix. Then it creates an array of strings containing roads with the given prefix. Method is used by LiveSearchBox
        Parameters:
        key - The text written in LiveSearchBox.
        Returns:
        Array of String that can be placed in the drop down menu in the LiveSearchBox.
        See Also:
        LiveSearchBox, GUI

      • getRoadPlan

        public void getRoadPlan(java.lang.String from,
               java.lang.String to)
        This methods gets 2 String representing from and to. It gives them to the address parser (to chop up the string), then to the TST (to get the corresponding connection ID), then to Graph (to calculated the shortest route) and then to map to paint the route.
        Parameters:
        from - the "from" String
        to - the "to" String
